ygData.subject: Re: Unfair?
ygData.msgSnippet: thats has always been there. It just doesnt happen often unless you get to higher levels. At lvl 12 I see it occur maybe 1 out of every 25 to 30 interrupts,
ygData.messageBody:
thats has always been there. It just doesnt happen often unless you get to
higher levels. At lvl 12 I see it occur maybe 1 out of every 25 to 30
interrupts, and even then only if im fighting greens and low level blues



At 10:43 AM 4/27/99 -0500, you wrote:
>From: "John Penman" <jpenman@...>
>

>night I received a message while in combat taht stated "You regained
>concentration" and it cast my spells after it told me I lost concentration.
>Could be the first steps...? Who knows.
